details.publicNotes: Almost affable and cheery in their greeting, nothing can cause you to shake the feeling that this pony is hiding something more than a dagger.

description.value: This small, bladed weapon is held in one hand and used to stab a creature in close combat. It can also be thrown.
The nature of this dagger is unclear.
This small, bladed weapon is held in one hand and used to stab a creature in close combat. It can also be thrown.
This leather armor is reinforced with metal studs and sometimes small metal plates, providing most of the flexibility of leather armor with more robust protection.
The nature of this studded leather armor is unclear.
This leather armor is reinforced with metal studs and sometimes small metal plates, providing most of the flexibility of leather armor with more robust protection.
Saving Throw DC 21 Fortitude, only works on fey instead of humanoids.
Pony with hoof +13 for 1d4+8 bludgeoning, or a large bat with fly Speed 40 feet.

With a powerful and alien screech, the world is revealed in a new way. The werebat gains a new precise sense with a range equal to twice their fly Speed until the end of their next turn, effective on anything with a material body, but unable to determine colors and visual details through the sonic medium.
